channel.title: Java help with .bat
channel.description:
OK....second time im posting about this.When i open a .bat file it always comes up with this:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continue . . .
Everytime it does this..tried redownloading clients,download jdk 6 java and it still doesnt work plz help :confused:

item.title: Java help with .bat

item.description:

OK…second time im posting about this.When i open a .bat file it always comes up with this:

Press any key to continue . . .
